attributes.action: Proscribe & shutdown Britain First, The BNP and The English Defence League (EDL)
attributes.additional_details:
Terrorism Act 2000:
https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/509003/20160318proscription.pdf

Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006:
http://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/2006/1/schedule
attributes.background: We call on the British government to give serious consideration to proscribing Britain First, The British National Party (BNP) and The English Defence League (EDL) under the Terrorism Act 2000 and the Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006 legislation.
